The evaluation test effectiveness offering relationship skills education service robust economic security component low-income couple raise child .
DOC.brief_title: Testing Relationship Skills Education Services With Robust Economic Security Component
DOC.detailed_description: The evaluation Empowering Families test effectiveness offering relationship skills education service robust economic security component low-income couple raise child . The program build Family Wellness , relationship education curriculum yet rigorously study . The Parenting Center ( TPC ) integrate Family Wellness comprehensive set service include case management , employment service , financial coaching . The evaluation test effect full package service couple ' relationship employment outcomes . The evaluation also examine effect outcomes related child well-being , co-parenting father involvement . The Empowering Families evaluation conduct low-income couple raise child . To eligible program service , member couple must : ( 1 ) age 18 old , ( 2 ) report commit relationship partner ; ( 3 ) speak language programming offer ; ( 4 ) interested participate program offer relationship skill economic stability service ; ( 5 ) available participate program next six month ; ( 6 ) pas domestic violence screen ; ( 7 ) open case child protective service . In addition , least one member couple must biological adopt child age 18 life least half time . The Parenting Center aim recruit couple economically disadvantage likely want relationship skill employment service . The evaluation plan Empowering Families program call enrollment random assignment 1,000 couple course two year . This target require The Parenting Center recruit approximately 42 couple study month . Half couple randomly assign Empowering Families program ; half assign control group eligible program services.To document outcome study participant , survey data collect two time point : ( 1 ) baseline survey administer study enrollment ( 2 ) follow-up survey conduct year later . The investigator also conduct process study document Empowering Families implement .
DOC.criteria: ( Necessary eligibility ) 1. age 18 old 2. report commit relationship partner 3. speak language programming offer 4. interested participate program offer relationship skill economic stability service 5. available participate program next six month ; 6. pas domestic violence screen 7. open case child protective service . 8. least one member couple must biological adopt child age 18 life least half time . Ineligible meet .
